notesStmt.note: A nearly complete, non-consecutive parchment. 31 lines per page; Fol. 1 contains from Tsaṿ, early in Parsha 8 הרי זה בלא ירצה - towards the end of Perek 13 (9) הציבור האוכלת; fol. 2 contains Sheratsim, Perek 3 (6) ופסוקת הגרגרת to early in Parsha 5 ופרה ורבה אף אין; Parallel to, in ms. Vatican Ebr. 66 p. 160 l. 19 'p. 164. l. 20 / p. 206 l. 11 'p. 210 l. 6; text is divided into chapters and subdivided into numbered halakhot.
Condition: non-consecutive, complete; unevenly cut; losses in edges, stained.
